summary: The speaker expresses frustration and disappointment while searching for family-friendly hotels on Mallorca. They spent the last one and a half hours looking through various options but found nothing within their budget. The speaker mentions that even though some options exist, they are extremely expensive, ranging from 4,000 to 6,000 Euros per week. This has led them to give up on the search, feeling overwhelmed and demotivated by the high costs.
